RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 73. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: UTAMARO drifted out while going to the front early then angled in near the seven-eighths, disputed the pace on the inside of a foe while off the rail, vied in the two path while asked on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a right-handed crop, drifted out when switched to a left-handed crop approaching the furlong marker, went back to a right-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole and extended the advantage while kept to the task. MUNNY FOR NUTHIN was taken under restraint early then rated just off the pace, came under urging in the three path on the turn, pursued the winner while remaining on his inside lead in the stretch and safely secured the place. KENTUCKY JOKER bumped with a rival at the start then jostled with that foe, was forwardly placed on the outside, passed the nine-sixteenths under urging, chased in the six path on the turn, lugged inward under extra right-rein pressure in the stretch and weakened but was clear for the show. WAFLR broke out and bumped with a foe, was well placed down the backstretch, dropped back near the half-mile pole, was urged three to four wide on the turn and lacked the needed response. PERFECT OUTCOME bumped with a foe just after the start, prompted the pace on the outside, dropped back leaving the backstretch, chased in the five path through the turn, brushed with a foe while between horses in upper stretch and tired. ACADEMY CHOICE showed speed on the outside of a foe, vied in the four path while asked on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch then brushed with a foe and capitulated. SINALOA bobbled after the start then bumped with rivals on both sides, jostled with a foe shortly thereafter, settled at the rear, moved in late on the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path and failed to threaten.

ENTRY.NAME: Utamaro
ENTRY.COMMENT: drift out early,mvd in,pace ins foe,ask 2p turn,drift out1/8,held

ENTRY.NAME: Munny for Nuthin
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated just off pace,asked 3path turn,chased,left lead lane,clr2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Academy Choice
ENTRY.OWNER: McMahon Michael J Windways Farm Long Eric Y Sedgwick Farm Begg James Bentley Cop
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed,pace outside foe,asked 4path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Waflr
ENTRY.OWNER: Siegel Sez Stables and Shaw Ken
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,well placed,drop back1/2,4-3p turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Kentucky Joker
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,jstld,up close,urged4-1/2,6p turn,lugged in,clear show

ENTRY.NAME: Sinaloa
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled after brk,bmpd,jstld,settled,mvd in1/2,2p turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Perfect Outcome
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd after brk,prompt out,drop back ins1/2,chsd 5p turn,tired

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUN SONG coaxed from the gate, chased three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied between foes to take narrow command just inside the eighth pole, dug in gamely to hold sway and prevail at the end. VALUE AREA struck the off side stall at the start getting away last and conceding three lengths to the front before settling into stride, chased five wide advancing on the front midway on the turn, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, continued five wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command heads apart from a pair a furlong out, got headed just inside that station and fought on to the finish to secure the place honors. DON'T SAY IT coaxed from the gate, showed the way in hand along the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in under threat from a pair and was collared a furlong out, battled on latched on inside the top two through to the wire. STREET VIEW coaxed from the start, chased four wide under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, swung four to five wide into upper stretch, weakened. PROGENY chased along the inside under coaxing from the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, weakened. MATAGORA BAY struck the near side stall at the start and was away a half a beat slow when placed to coaxing, chased just off the inside under a ride from the three-eighths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Progeny
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Matagora Bay
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3-4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Say It
ENTRY.OWNER: Full of Run Racing Two and Ten Strike Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand ins, 2p 5/16, 3w uppr, collared, battled on

ENTRY.NAME: Value Area
ENTRY.OWNER: Eclipse Thoroughbred Partners and Lewin Gary F
ENTRY.COMMENT: hit gate st, chased 5w, bid 3/8, 5w uppr, up, headed, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4w uppr, up ins 1/8, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Street View
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4w, coaxed 5/16, 4-5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MORNING CUP pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the four path on the turn, took the lead in the five path into upper stretch, responded well in the final fulrong and proved best under steady handling. GUN MAESTRO went to the front, showed the way under pressure to his outside while off the rail, vied in the three path on the turn, dropped to the two path near the quarter-pole, lost the advantage into upper stretch and was outfinished while just able to hold the place. M B'S MUNNING broke a half-step slow, was coaxed along just off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, made a rail near the rail outside the quarter-pole, pursued the top two into the final furlong, moved out near the sixteenth-pole and finished willingly to just miss the place. MAKAR charged the front of the gate just prior to the start, hit the front of the stall doors and was off slow, moved out then advanced while urged along on the outside, went five then four wide on the turn and came up empty. WITH KNOW NAME was off a half-step slow, dropped to the rear under urging, went three wide on the turn and was no factor. ITSALITTLEBITFUNNY was hustled from the gate, chased the pace down the backstretch, dropped back while inside to the two path on the turn and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Itsalittlebitfunny
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled, chased, dropped back ins-2path turn, capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: Gun Maestro
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,3path turn,2path1/4,headed,outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: M B's Munning
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 step slow,urged,just off pace,2p turn,rail bid1/4,chsd

ENTRY.NAME: With Know Name
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 step slow,mvd out,urged,3wide turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Makar
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: charged gate,hit front,off slow,urged out,5-4path turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Morning Cup
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,4path turn,lead 5path3/16,prevailed,driving

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 98. Claiming Purse 45000. (UP TO $7,830 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Ass essment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GUNTOWN chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, rallied to take command a furlong out, inched away kept to task to the finish. LAUGHING BOY showed the way in hand just off the inside coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was collared a furlong from home, ran on to be along clear of the rest and second best. WINNING CONNECTION broke in at the start, chased five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, continued five wide into upper stretch, kept on to procure the show honors. ANTHRACITE chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, passed tired rivals. DEVIL'S CAY chased along the inside under coaxing from midway on the turn, continued along the inside route into upper stretch, weakened. BORN A GAMBLER chased four wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled six wide into upper stretch, weakened. JESTER'S SONG three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch, tired. ROCK THE WEEKEND chased just off the inside coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled four wide into upper stretch, tired. COMPLETE AGENDA lunged at the break and stumbled getting away last, chased three wide under coaxing from midway on the turn, went four wide into upper stretch, trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Devil's Cay
ENTRY.OWNER: Anthony George Roman Lawrence P Emerald Upstate Stable CT Racing Basile Stephen
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, coaxed 3/8, inside 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Laughing Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, collared 1/8, ran on, 2nd best

ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Carney Christopher L and Casal Jorge
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in st, chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Rock the Weekend
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, angled 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Anthracite
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 2w 1/4p, passed tired foes

ENTRY.NAME: Guntown
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3-2w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, up 1/8p, inched away

ENTRY.NAME: Jester's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3w, coaxed 3/8, 4w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Born a Gambler
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 4w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Complete Agenda
ENTRY.COMMENT: lunge, stumbled st, chased 3w, 4w upper, trailed throughout

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 1M Dirt CR: 91. Claiming Purse 42000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare A ssessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: COOL QUARTET was well spotted just off the pace, came under encouragement while stalking in the four path on the turn, rallied six wide into the stretch, made an outside bid while remaining on his left lead, swapped to the proper lead while taking the advantage into the final furlong and drew clear under steady handling. DURKIN'S CALL was hustled from the gate, stalked the pace while in hand, made a bid in the five path on the turn, took the lead at the quarter-pole, was asked for his best in upper stretch, lost the lead to the winner into the final furlong and proved no match while clear for the place. GOLDINI was forwardly placed on the outside, went six wide on the turn, was roused late on that bend then driven seven wide into the stretch and weakened but was clear for the show. FORTY TWO ACE was coaxed to the front, contested the pace on the inside of a rival, was asked in the two path on the turn, lost the lead at the quarter-pole and tired. HANG TIGHT settled off the pace, was urged along passing the five-eighths pole, saved ground on the turn and failed to threaten. DONTBELATE bumped with a foe at the start, disputed the pace, vied in the three path on the turn and capitulated. LORD GATLING settled towards the rear, saved ground on the turn and failed to respond. DATESFREEDOM bumped with an opponent at the start, settled off the pace, was urged two then three wide on the turn and also failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Dontbelate
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,pace,3path turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Forty Two Ace
ENTRY.OWNER: Ten Strike Racing Four Corners Racing Broadview Stables and Cory Moelis Racing L
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed to front,inside foe,2path turn,headed1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Lord Gatling
ENTRY.COMMENT: towards rear, inside turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: dh-Hang Tight
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, urged 5/8, saved ground, no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Datesfreedom
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,settled,2-3path turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Cool Quartet
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,asked 4path turn,6path1/4,bid,lead1/8,drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Durkin's Call
ENTRY.OWNER: Grab Gary and Chief Big Blue Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,stalked,bid 5path turn,lead1/4,headed1/8,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Goldini
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez, Rudy R. and Imperio, Michael
ENTRY.COMMENT: up close outside,asked 6path turn,7path1/4,weakened,best rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RATHMORE established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside, tucked a bit closer to the rail through the latter portion of the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat rebuffing the challenge and lasted at the end. FOR YOUR PLEASURE got away to an awkward beginning breaking a beat slow and then conceding three lengths to the front, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong but was ultimately repelled to the finish. ALEAH ALEAH chased along the inside patiently handled until roused taking the inside route into upper stretch, attempted to angle out from in behind the leader and couldn't with HAVE YOU HEARD to the outside, ran on along the rail behind the leader through to the finish to secure the show honors. HAVE YOU HEARD three to four paths off the inside down the backstretch, chased three then two wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive keeping on to the finish. UNION BULLDOG coaxed from the gate, chased four then three wide, got set down angled five wide into upper stretch, made no late headway. J D FACTOR five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was outkicked. SPEED CONTROL coaxed from the gate, chased six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then three to four wide through the turn, continued three to four wide into upper stretch and weakened in the final furlong. DOWNING STREET coaxed from the start, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch and then just off the inside through the turn coaxed along from the three-eighths, went six wide into upper stretch and trailed.

ENTRY.NAME: Aleah Aleah
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased inside, inside 1/4, beh foes to 1/16p, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Union Bulldog
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-3w, set down 5w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: For Your Pleasure
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 5/16, 3-4w upper, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Speed Control
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, 6w backstretch, 4-3w turn, 3-4w upper, wknd late

ENTRY.NAME: Downing Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 4-2w, coaxed 3/8, 6w upper, trailed

ENTRY.NAME: Rathmore
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed ins near 1/4, ins 1/4, dug in, lasted

ENTRY.NAME: J D Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: 5w backstretch, 3w turn, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Have You Heard
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-4w, coaxed 3-2w 5/16, 2w 1/4p, dug in, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 94. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THUNDERIAN tracked the pace, made a bid late on the backstretch, vied in the four path on the turn, led into upper stretch, dueled inside of the runner-up to the finish and gamely prevailed. BROOKLYN DIAMONDS was forwardly placed on the outside, chased five then four wide on the turn, gained to make a bid into upper stretch, dueled outside of the winner to the finish and was denied while clear for the place. MEMPHIS climbed some early then dropped well back, went four then five wide on the turn, came seven wide into the stretch and was along for the show. MAGICAL WAYS was well placed just off the pace, chased inside on the turn, was driven three wide into the stretch, pursued the top two under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. ICE ROAD raced just off the pace, chased three to four wide on the turn, came five wide into upper stretch and lacked the needed response. WHAT'S UP DOC settled off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, went around most of the turn in the two path then shifted four wide, came six wide into upper stretch and failed to rally. CLUBHOUSE disputed the pace on the backstretch, vied three then two wide on the turn and tired. BERLONE prompted the pace on the inside, vied along the rail on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and capitulated. RALLY SQUIRREL disputed the pace between horses, dropped back in the two path on the turn and retreated. BARON'S LEGACY angled in at the rear, moved from three to five wide on the turn and showed little.

ENTRY.NAME: Berlone
ENTRY.COMMENT: prompted inside,rail turn,drop back 3/16,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Rally Squirrel
ENTRY.COMMENT: pace between, dropped back 2path turn, retreated

ENTRY.NAME: Magical Ways
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace, chased inside turn, 3wide into lane, weakened

ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,dropped back7/16,2-4path turn,6p into upper,no rally

ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,chased 3-4path turn,5w3/16,mvd out,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Clubhouse
ENTRY.COMMENT: disputed pace, 3-2path turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Baron's Legacy
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,at rear,3-5path turn,faltered,showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Memphis
ENTRY.COMMENT: climbed bit early,drop back,4-5path turn,7w1/4,up for show

ENTRY.COMMENT: up close,outside,chsd 5-4p turn,bid3/16,dueled,denied

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 1M Dirt CR: 102. Allowance Purse 100000. (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIGNATOR six to seven paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked five wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive steadily gaining to take command seventy yards from the finish, then inched away in the late going. CASCAIS showed the way in hand three then two wide under some pressure from CAPE TRAFALGAR to the outside, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught seventy yards from the finish. ROCCO STRONG coaxed from the gate, chased six then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive running on willingly to secure the show honors. MACALLAN chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, went eight wide into upper stretch, offered up a mild kick. QUALITY CHIC coaxed from the start, chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, continued along the inside route into upper stretch, weakened in the late stages. CLASSIC MARK chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, cornered three wide at the head of the stretch, weakened. CAPE TRAFALGAR prompted the leader from the outside five then three wide, came under coaxing near the quarter pole, swung four wide into upper stretch, tired. LUNI SIMA chased five to six paths off the inside down the backstretch and then four wide through the turn coming under coaxing midway, swung six wide into upper stretch and tired. PADDINGTON chased two to three wide down the backstretch before tucking inside through the turn, got placed to coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and made no impact.

ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased inside, coaxed 3/8, ins 1/4, wknd late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 6F Dirt CR: 77. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ASHBURN ALLEY disputed the pace on the outside then in the four path on the turn, shook clear in upper stretch, remained on her left lead in the drive and proved much the best under steady urging. PHOTO FINISH was urged along off the pace, moved out near the five-eighths, went four wide on the turn, came five wide into upper stretch, moved in inside the furlong marker and got up for the place. BOOK OF WISDOM was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn, pursued the winner in the stretch and just lost the place. TAVIN was hustled from the gate, contested the pace between horses, vied in the three path on the turn and weakened. BEACH CRUISER bumped with a rival at the start, was taken in hand briefly near the five-eighths then chased the pace, angled from the two path to the five path on the turn and came up empty. MISS BOURBON brushed the outside of the gate at the start, was urged along on the outside, went five wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and also came up empty. LA INDECENTE was coaxed along off the pace, saved ground on the turn and failed to respond. GOING FOR GLORY broke a bit slow then dropped back, angled in under urging at the rear, went three wide on the turn and failed to threaten. MY KINDA MISCHIEF bumped with a foe at the start, was urged along off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, dropped back into upper stretch and tired. MYSARIA was urged along off the pace, fell back fast late on the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path and was no factor.
